code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     DeleteIndexTemplateRequest deleteIndexTemplateRequest = new DeleteIndexTemplateRequest(request.param("name")).     deleteIndexTemplateRequest.masterNodeTimeout(request.paramAsTime("master_timeout", deleteIndexTemplateRequest.masterNodeTimeout())).     return channel -> client.admin().indices().deleteTemplate(deleteIndexTemplateRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
